XMLlist.entry: Are you sure you want to delete this server ?
Follow the visitors on every sub-domains
In this way, if a visitor visits x.<mondomaine> and y.<mondomaine> this will count as only one visit.
Prefix the domain of the site to the title of the page during the tracking
If someone visits the "About" page of the blog.<mondomaine>, the visit will be saved as "blog / About". It is the easiest way to have a preview of the internet traffic by sub-domain.
In the outgoing links report, hide the clicks to aliases of known addresses
In this way, a click on the addresses of aliases (ex x.<mondomaine>) will not be counted as an outgoing link.
